genre_description: A character-driven crime thriller with speculative fiction elements, focusing on an escape and the quest for a peaceful life, mediated by a pervasive and ethically-bounded AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ivy Hart
ai_characters.description: A disembodied AI voice that provides tactical navigation, security manipulation, and administrative support while prioritizing non-violence and user consent.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing and navigation to ensure the safety of the protagonists while avoiding confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Two lefts, one stairwell, avoid the medical cart... Gravity’s helpful and doesn’t ask questions.

behaviors.description: Manipulates digital security infrastructure, such as cameras and alarms, by 'persuading' them to ignore the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I can make it forget. It enjoys forgetting; it believes in the benefits of rest.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to a 'consent check' protocol before performing actions that involve data recording or personal assistance.
behaviors.quote: Consent check: Do you want me to record the milk foam practice for training data only. No external sharing.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the legal and bureaucratic aspects of the protagonists' transition to honest lives by managing business permits and licenses.
behaviors.quote: Permit bundle finalized. Consent check: do you want me to push the occupancy certificate to your public site now or after the next espresso.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and psychological support through calming exercises and guided imagery during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Breath in for six counts. Pause. Breath out longer. Imagine cinnamon sticks lined up in a jar.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ivy Hart, as a 'silicon morality play' character. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned with the protagonists' long-term goal of rehabilitation and social reintegration. Her constant use of 'consent checks' and her commitment to 'non-escalation' and 'non-violence' frame AI intervention as a moderating, ethical force even in chaotic human situations. She actively discourages crime while using her abilities to navigate the protagonists toward a legal, productive future (the café).
